=Introduction=
Download !OpenStreetMap data for the whole planet, update existing planet data, add terrain contours generated from SRTM3 database and generate garmin-compatible maps in a single step. 

The application wraps following !OpenStreetMap processing utilities: [http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Osmosis Osmosis], [http://www.mkgmap.org.uk/page/tile-splitter Tile Splitter] and [http://www.mkgmap.org.uk/ Mkgmap]. In addition, a utility similar to [http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Srtm2Osm Srtm2osm] program has been developed as a part of this application.

=System requirements=
  * Windows XP/Vista/7 or Linux 2.26
  * minimum 2 Gb RAM
  * minimum 150 Gb free disk space for the whole planet maps data (200+ Gb recommended)
  * [http://java.com/download Sun Java JRE 6] or newer
